_exec_summary.SummaryText:
This summary will list the support document used to file this RMP for the Village of Attica Wastewater Treatment Plant. Call list A. JPEG, Chlorine Safety . Doc JPEG, leak flow chart GIF, endpoint map. JPEG. To calculate our estimated resident population within our distance to endpoint we counted households and then used Wyoming County, Genesee County,and Village of Attica census records to arrive at our final number. To calculate our Alternative Release we assumed that a regulator was knocked off of the container valve. Our chlorine supplier (Jones Chemical) informed us that the flow through our container valve opened 1/2 turn would be intermittent due to the freezing/thawing at the orfice. The leak could be stopped by a properly equipped operator simply closing the container valve (1/2 turn).
